about_the_game:
Lost Gorga is a captivating puzzle adventure where players collect translation tokens to understand hints that help you progress. Immerse yourself in a world of exploration and brain-teasing challenges as you uncover the mysteries of Lost Gorga.

Content


  • 3 character types that speak their own style of gibberish to the player
  • 3 translation tokens that each interpret a different type of gibberish
  • 10 scenes across 3 areas each with a unique navigation puzzle

Credits

  • Fantasy 16x16 Pixel Art Asset Pack by Appel on Itch
  • Main Theme - Music By: Kevin MacLeod
    Song Name: Itty Bitty 8 Bit
  • Dark Forest Theme - Music By: Eric Skiff
    Song Name: Undercloaked
  • Credits Theme - Music By: Kubbi
    Song Name: Digestive Biscuit
  • "8-Bit Sound Effects Library" by LittleRobotSoundFactory

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300, Raspberry Pi 4
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Raspberry Pi 5 with overclocking

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500, Apple M1

name: Lost Gorga

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 / AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2500, AMD Radeon R5 Graphics
  • Storage: 74 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows 7/8/8.1 are supported on a best-effort basis. These versions are not regularly tested and some features may be missing.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • Storage: 74 MB available space

short_description: Lost Gorga is a captivating puzzle adventure where players collect translation tokens to understand hints that help you progress. Immerse yourself in a world of exploration and brain-teasing challenges as you uncover the mysteries of Lost Gorga.
